statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 6 \\ -4 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ -16 \\ 8 \\ 28 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ -24 \\ 12 \\ 42 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
